content: विच्छिन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Torn asunder, cut off. {@--2@} Broken, severed, divided, separated; <ls>Ś. 1. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Interrupted, prevented. {@--4@} Ended, ceased, terminated. {@--5@} Variegated. {@--6@} Hidden. {@--7@} Smeared or painted with unguents. {@--8@} Crooked, curved.
